languages.text: {n}Глаза старухи в ужасе расширяются — но лишь на миг.{/n} "Если посланни{mf|к|ца} звезд требует жертву, эта правительница с честью исполню сию роль".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза старухи в ужасе расширяются — но лишь на миг.{/n} "Если посланни{mf|к|ца} звезд требует жертву, эта правительница с честью исполню сию роль".

languages.text: {n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза старухи в ужасе расширяются — но лишь на миг.{/n} "Если посланни{mf|к|ца} звезд требует жертву, эта правительница с честью исполню сию роль".

traits.locale_text: {n}The eyes of the old woman widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the messenger of the gods demands a sacrifice, this ruler would be honoured to play this role."
{n}The eyes of the old woman widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the messenger of the gods demands a sacrifice, this ruler would be honoured to play this role."
{n}The eyes of the old woman widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the messenger of the gods demands a sacrifice, this ruler would be honoured to play this role."
{n}The eyes of the old woman widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the messenger of the gods demands a sacrifice, this ruler would be honoured to play this role."
{n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."
{n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."

languages.text: {n}La anciana abre los ojos como platos, asustada, pero solo por un instante.{/n} «Si {mf|el Emisario|la Emisaria} Celestial exige un sacrificio, será un honor para esta jefa ser voluntaria».
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana abre los ojos como platos, asustada, pero solo por un instante.{/n} «Si {mf|el mensajero|la mensajera} de los dioses exige un sacrificio, será un honor para esta jefa ofrecerse como voluntaria».

languages.text: {n}老妇人惊恐地睁大了眼睛，但片刻之后，她的恐惧就消失了。{/n}“如果圣使要求祭品，那此酋长很荣幸能充当这个角色。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."

traits.locale_text: {n}老祭司惊恐地睁大了眼睛，但片刻之后，她的恐惧就消失了。{/n}“如果神明的使者要求祭品，那么，此酋长很荣幸能充当这个角色。”

languages.text: {n}Ses yeux s'écarquillent de frayeur, mais seulement l'espace d'un instant.{/n} « Si l'émissaire céleste exige un sacrifice, cette dirigeante serait honorée de jouer ce rôle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de la vieille femme s'écarquillent de frayeur, mais seulement l'espace d'un instant.{/n} « Si l'émissaire des dieux exige un sacrifice, cette dirigeante serait honorée de jouer ce rôle. »

languages.text: {n}彼女の目が恐怖に見開かれた。 しかし、それは一瞬のことだった。{/n}「天の先駆者が生贄を要求するのであれば、この支配者はその役割を果たすことを光栄に思おう」
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の目が恐怖に見開かれた。 しかし、それは一瞬のことだった。{/n}「天の先駆者が生贄を要求するのであれば、この支配者はその役割を果たすことを光栄に思おう」

languages.text: {n}Ihre Augen weiten sich vor Furcht, allerdings nur kurz.{/n} "Wenn der Himmel-Herold ein Opfer verlangt, dient diese Herrscherin gerne als solches."
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen der alten Frau weiten sich vor Furcht, allerdings nur kurz.{/n} "Wenn {mf|der Bote|die Botin} der Götter ein Opfer fordert, wäre diese Herrscherin geehrt, diese Rolle zu spielen."

languages.text: {n}Gözleri, bir anlığına da olsa korkuyla açılıyor.{/n} "Eğer ki Gök Müjdecisi kurban talep ediyorsa bu hükümdar, kurban olarak hizmet etmekten onur duyar."
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes widen in fear — but only for a moment.{/n} "If the Sky-Herald demands a sacrifice, this ruler is honoured to serve as one."
